name: trilobed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with three lobes (= separate parts): Leaves that are unlobed, bilobed, or trilobed appear on the same plant. The central area is filled with a trilobate foliate motif. Compare
bilobed
More examplesFewer examplesBoth lungs were trilobed and the main bronchuses were of equal length.The plates are often decorated on all four corners with small posts that are capped off with a trilobate shape.The central figure is the tree, while the trilobed element on the crown is an indicator of sprouting vegetation.
